synopsis.text: Hoshiwatari Goro embarks on a cosmic journey in a future where dimensional tunnels have unlocked the secrets of interstellar travel, enabling humanity to traverse the vastness of space and visit distant planets. Goro joins the crew of Yamamoto Anshin Travel (YAT), a space tourism company, in search of his missing father who disappeared under mysterious circumstances years ago. With only an old photograph as a clue, Goro's quest for answers leads him to an unexpected accident, leaving him indebted to YAT. As he works off his debt, Goro's adventures unfold among the stars, accompanied by the charming Katsura, the company owner's daughter, who finds herself captivated by his determination. Amidst the wonders of space, Goro and the YAT crew face challenges that test their resolve and push the boundaries of their knowledge, all while seeking the truth behind Goro's father's disappearance and the enigmatic Gannon who rule unknown regions of space.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
